tagline: a simple lazyload widget based on yui3
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
YUI3 LazyLoad
=============

* LazyLoader 懒加载器，负责管理懒加载对象实例及监控视窗位置
* LazyLoadItem 懒加载对象，需要懒加载内容的对象实例
* ExecScript 过滤并内容执行内容中的脚本（todo 待优化）
name: YUI3 LazyLoad Widget
